description: This file provides database connection management and query execution functions for a PostgreSQL database, using psycopg2. It includes configuration loading, connection handling with context managers, and utility functions for fetching data and executing SQL statements.

classes.name: DbConfig
classes.description: A dataclass representing PostgreSQL connection configuration, specifically the DSN string.

methods.name: str _resolve_db_connection_file()
methods.description: Resolves the file path for the database connection info based on project directory structure.

methods.name: DbConfig load_db_config()
methods.description: Loads and parses the database connection string from the 'db_connection.txt' file.

methods.name: Iterator["psycopg2.extensions.connection"] get_conn()
methods.description: Provides a context-managed PostgreSQL connection that handles commit/rollback and resource cleanup.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] fetch_all(sql: str, params: Optional[Tuple[Any, ...]] = None)
methods.description: Executes a SQL query and returns all resulting rows as a list of dictionaries.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] fetch_one(sql: str, params: Optional[Tuple[Any, ...]] = None)
methods.description: Executes a SQL query and returns a single row as a dictionary, or None if no row is found.

methods.name: int execute(sql: str, params: Optional[Tuple[Any, ...]] = None)
methods.description: Performs a non-SELECT SQL statement and returns the number of affected rows.

ctags.name: execute
ctags.pattern: /^def execute(sql: str, params: Optional[Tuple[Any, ...]] = None) -> int:$/

ctags.name: fetch_all
ctags.pattern: /^def fetch_all(sql: str, params: Optional[Tuple[Any, ...]] = None) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:$/

ctags.name: fetch_one
ctags.pattern: /^def fetch_one(sql: str, params: Optional[Tuple[Any, ...]] = None) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:$/
